website_summaries.verdict: The TiVo Premiere Elite might be a luxury, but it's definitely a luxury worth paying for.
pros: The TiVo Premiere Elite can record from four tuners at once to its 2TB of storage
TiVo continues to offer a best-in-class DVR experience, plus a top-notch suite of streaming-video services, including Netflix and Hulu Plus
cons: Cable cutters and satellite subscribers will be disappointed that the Elite works with digital cable and Verizon Fios only
And even if TiVo does work with your cable provider, you won't be able to access any pay-per-view or VOD content
The Elite is $500 plus $500 for lifetime service or $19.99 a month, which is much more than the alternatives
And there's still no built-in Wi-Fi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and with excellent quality. I received it very quickly. I bought this product to replace the current product I’m using in the same category and I must say that it definitely does the job better than I ever would’ve thought. Packaging, materials are all top notch and above my exceptions. I found this product by accident and decided to give it a shot and I couldn’t be happier. It’s lightweight and durable. I don’t believe I will be switching products anytime soon. If you’re contemplating on buying this product I’d definitely give it a shot, I don’t think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: It's the best DVR I've ever used. Much much better than the DVR's that I've tried from the cable companies.
customer_reviews.text: I was an early adopter back when TiVo first came out. Back then, if you wanted to record several shows that were being shown at the same time, you had to have multiple TiVo's since they only had one tuner. I had three, one for each of the major networks. We're now using a TiVo Premiere XL4 with 4 tuners to get all of our shows and we can watch any of them in the bedroom (in HD) thanks to our second TiVo Premiere and MoCa connectivity. We also watch Netflix and Amazon Instant Video on the TiVo so there's no need for another 'box'. We're now thinking of getting a TiVo Roamio as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rich K

customer_reviews.title: helps to reduce my cable ever rising cost.
customer_reviews.text: i am not a "new" TiVo owner. I was part of the early on TiVo owners. Loved the idea because it was revolutionary and gave the user control over their TV and ability to record live TV, skip items of no interest, backup and replay at normal, fast, or slow motion speeds. In short: TiVo invented the idea, software and hardware to do what others have now made commonplace but offer to their clients good but older products. The newer TiVo product is even better inthat it is better than is offered by today's carriers because it is NEW, dependable product vended by intelligent, caring people. Check them out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best DVR on the market
customer_reviews.text: But it's still far from perfect. It's better than Windows Media Center in most ways, except for the speed of the UI and TiVo's inability to deal with multiple channels with the same programming or SD/HD channels (I just took the SD channels out of the guide). The UI is slow, but otherwise it's a great box to use. The remote is AMAZING, and better than anything else out there. There is, however, a new model coming out for the holidays, so at this point, I'd probably wait. I wanted one, so I bought knowing that there will be a new model coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So totally Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love TiVo, this was an upgrade needed for a box we had for quite some time about 7 yes to be exact. It really helps when we move and the kids TV shows are recorded and saved. This Keeps them occupied in one room and fairly content while we move(military). Also helps when cable guy cannot hook up for week or two, you can access netflix, amazon, and hulu through TiVo as long as you have internet access and don't really need cable. Love it! Set up is a breeze.plus havering more than one w
customer_reviews.author: Aawc1903

customer_reviews.title: I record lots of programs and can watch or delete at any time. four tuners are much better than one.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Tivo since 2005. I still have that series 2 and have added a Premiere and a Premiere XL4 all with lifetime service. Counting back 9 years you can guess how much I have saved. Convenience is the main reason for having Tivo. We used to tape shows on our VCR and now it is so easy to record something and keep it longterm or watch right away. When we are traveling or on vacation we don't have to worry about an episode being missed and we can just enjoy the NOW time. Thank you, TIVO! Gilbert Tanner
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert J

customer_reviews.title: A real cable company buster
customer_reviews.text: Love the 4 channel recording capability. I absolutley hate how all the networks are trying to keep you on thier channel by starting and stoopping shows 2 or 3 minutes early or late, so your recorder will have fits. Having 4 channels has pretty well taken care of THAT issue. Had an older TIVO for @ 6 years and switched to TWC HD recorder when it started showing its age. After one month, figured screw it they have NOT improved their recorder to even begin to compete with the TIVO...bought the Premiere4 and went back to TIVO.
customer_reviews.author: Les Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Long set up, vast improvement over older Tivos
customer_reviews.text: The hardware setup for this devise only took about 20 minutes. It was essentially a matter of plugging in three wires ( A/C, cable, HDMI). Most of the time was spent crawling around on the floor snaking wires. The software setup took close to 2 hours. Not difficult since the on screen menus were easy to follow but there were lots of decisions that had to be gone through. Still the time was well worth it since this devise functions much better than the 4 year old Tivos I had been using. A great value from J and R on a fine devise.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No DVR beats TiVo
customer_reviews.text: I've been aTiVo owner since the first year TiVo hit the market. TiVo is the most responsive DVR you can buy. Cable DVRs are still relatively in the dark ages. Functionality, speed, and response times to commands are far superior to any other DVR I've experienced. The menus are so informative and easy to use. The statement I make to other people that really sums it up is "TiVo has changed my life more than any other single appliance or electroninc device, including PCs, laptops, and smartphones."
customer_reviews.author: Buck Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: A Good TiVo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one 'eyes wide open', having experienced and having heard from other owners. 'It's slow', plain and simple. Though it does provide 4 tuners, a beautiful HD picture and abundant recording space, switching functions, going back and forth through the menus can be an exercise in pain and patience. Funny, the day after I bought this one, the newest was released. My guess is that they upgraded processor/menu speed amongst the improvements, but 'we'll see'.
customer_reviews.author: scs

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Premiere Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I was a Tivo fan going back to my Sony Sat T-60 with Tivo on Directv many years ago. The experience of being able to watch whenever you have time has been awesome! The one thing I would like to see is the ability to create custom folders so you could store similar programs by type or even a user as the folder title. You could place Movies, Sports, Concerts, etc together and dramatically reduce the My Shows list.. Just a thought! I am using mine with Charter Cable and all is working flawlessly. Great service and user interface!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Scarpone

customer_reviews.title: It records what we want without fail, it even finds those show that are not on yet due to season.
customer_reviews.text: We had a DVR from our cable company that would always miss show, it would always be full, and we had to add show to record when they were in season. All of those problems are gone, while we had to pay for the DVR and the service we get what we paid for, great HD recording that we do not need to delete every week because we are out of space. We can also off load some shows and expand our DVR capacity, who would love that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, HDMI and Optical connections.
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a Condo with HOA and didn't want to hassle with them about Sat dish. Had the first Directv Tivo DVR in the past, so I was familiar with the interface. Needed large storage so I picked the Premire XL and XL4. Netflix was a must. Xfinity on demand and great live tv makes it a no brainer. I can access my wife's XL and she can access my XL4. Had to get 2 separate units so there definitely is no conflicts! Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Raymo721

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and has plenty of recording space. It is perfect for taping multiple shows and accessing streaming media such as Netflix and Amazon. We were able to tape four shows at one time. No more conflicts.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: ToVo is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love me some TiVo! It's the best DVR software out there. This model is really nice. Tons of features and tons of room. Only down side to this at all is it gets a little slow sometimes. I suggest for scheduling shows do it directly on Tivo.com its way easier searching with your computer and it will send it right to your Tivo as long as you have it connected to your network with internet.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphodjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I decided I needed to upgrade from my Premiere, and I was trying to choose between this version and the Roamio. Considering that my biggest issue was recording more than 2 shows at once, and that the additional features of the Roamio were 'wants' and not 'needs', I went with this device. I am very happy with it (as I have been with all TiVos I have purchased over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Baier

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: In spite of there sometimes being a lag in the user interface, my largest regret about this TiVo was that I didn't buy one sooner. Setup, with the exception of having deal with Comcast's renowned ineptness, was a breeze. Having 4 tuners is something I don't know how I lived without. Deducting one star because the TiVo service IS pricey and the payoff point is many years down the road.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Zeman

customer_reviews.title: It transforms your Life!
customer_reviews.text: We now don't miss shows period! I can't tell you how many times we would miss a show on our old TiVo. We often see four shows recording at once. I can't tell you the last time we watched live TV. We even recorded the Super Bowl! We watch TV when we want to not when the programming dictates!
customer_reviews.author: A Prime Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend TiVo
customer_reviews.text: I know this is an older model now, but I'm upgrading from a standard Tivo Premiere 2 Tuner model. Compared to that model, I'm getting up to 350gb HD storage, and I can link Tivo Mini's for whole home viewing. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaaziah

customer_reviews.title: Better TiVo system than what is offered by cable company
customer_reviews.text: I love this... I'm able to watch both my Amazon Instant Videos but also my Xfinity on demand movies. The fact that I'm able to record four shows at once is also great. The only issue I have is even though I can program the remote to work with the tv I'm not able to "switch" my aux controls without using a different remote.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don't miss anything any more!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned TiVo's for the past 10 years and find that I don't miss any of my favorite shows any more! The addition of HD recording gave me the transfer to other HD units. I simply would not be without TiVo in my home today! Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetums

customer_reviews.title: ease of use.  But you need to test the updates.
customer_reviews.text: I love recording 4 shows at the same time. But your upgrade program messed up the tive big time. I had to pull the cable card and then reinsert it and then reboot. But it required many calls to my cable provider and a lot of wasted time. You should check to see if your updates work correctly. This happen to many people in Charlottesville, va.
customer_reviews.author: janice thompson

customer_reviews.title: Better performance in every way.  PLUS Netflix, YouTube and Amazon streaming AND free apps for cooking, exercising, games & MORE
customer_reviews.text: The perfect alternative to fiber, cable and satellite DVRs. You'll still need a $5 cable card from Verizon and $15 for monthly TiVo service, but well worth the extra 3.5TB of storage!!! We would have given 5 start but for Amazon's failure to join TiVo for free PRIME streaming. YES, even if you have Amazon PRIME your TiVo will still charge you to stream what should be already bought and paid.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use. Versatility.
customer_reviews.text: TiVo is my quiet love affair. I've got three of them and all three serve me quite well. I remember buying my first TiVo Series 2 from best buy ( still have, it's collecting dust) First program I did a test run on was the Jerry Springer show. (Don't judge me) Loved my TiVo ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: All my shows in one place, even if I switch cable providers
customer_reviews.text: I love having all my shows in one place, being able to record on 4 channels, and accessing content on demand like XFINITY, Netflix, Hulu, etc. I also love that if my cable provider changes, I don't have to return my DVR and lose all my shows and preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Lynder

customer_reviews.title: Love Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Makes watching quality TV so much easier. Much friendlier than evil cable company options. Bought lifetime service, so I need to use this for about 3 years to make it a financially positive investment. At this point, you would have to pry the Tivo out of my cold, dead hands, so the 3 years seems a cake walk....
customer_reviews.author: Sherilaw

customer_reviews.title: Tivo's the best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Tivo off and on since it first came out depending on availability with my cable system. After switching from u-verse to xfinity, I'm back on Tivo and loving it. It just works and the interface is easy to use. I love the wish list and being able to record my favorite sports teams automatically. The integration with netflix and Amazon instant video makes it very easy to find a program be it on cable, netflix or amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: We love being being able to record 4 shows at once time with built-in Netflix and YouTube. We no longer have to worry about our shows being deleted by the box because of not enough room. There is so much room to keep all the shows you wish to watch. We are very happy with this TIVO!
customer_reviews.author: ripsfan

customer_reviews.title: Love my Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Tivo continues to pack more features into small boxes. This one holds many more hours of HD programming and allows you to share control with a Tivo Mini. Only negative is that it requires an ugly tuner adapter to work with our local Time-Warner service.
customer_reviews.author: terrym21

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: returned item as our cable company can not support it
customer_reviews.author: C. Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Program from iPad, and take taped shows with me when I move.
customer_reviews.text: So far, happy with the service. Much better in most ways than cable DVR. Not perfect, but very close. A few functions are better on cable or sat. DVR, but overall, TiVo is far superior. The xl4 is great, because I can tape 4 at a time, or 3 and watch live TV.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Once you go to TIVO you will NEVER go back
customer_reviews.text: It took us YEARS to decide to go to TIVO. We heard the good and the bad. Let me tell you, we will NEVER give up our Tivo now. It holds so much more than a regular DVR, the customer service is wonderful, and the guides are great.
customer_reviews.author: tygress

customer_reviews.title: Never miss a show
customer_reviews.text: Besides being able to record all the shows I like and watch them when I want to watch them, commercial free is the only way to go. Seems like the commercials are taking over tv and are irritating. Love my tivo! We have two and thinking of a third!
customer_reviews.author: Debgem

customer_reviews.title: Analog cable companies don't support this item
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere did I see any warning that this device may not work if you are in an area where the only cable company in the area is still analog. I was told that even the cable card would not work for me. I tried and tried to find the reason and it took me MANY hours on the phone with Tivo and with Atlantic Broadband to get to the root of the problem. Service reps from both had no idea what was going on, I had to keep escalating to supervisor after supervisor!!! Part of the problem is the device, some of the problem is Tivo support, and unfortunately, some of the problem is Atlantic Broadband.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Really Great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice having the ability to record your shows and not lose them when you move to another location, the box is yours as well as the recordings on them; better than starting from scratch if you move and turn in your rented DVR
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Loera

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can record 4 shows at once.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great device. Just wish I had a good deal to have the Roamio instead of the xl4. However this has worked great allowing me and the wife to watch all of our shows on the weekend. I would fully recommend this DVR to anyone. The organization is great with recorded shows. My only complaint is this one is a little slower than the mini I have but that was to be expected since it's older.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Can you be in two places at once
customer_reviews.text: It seems like you can when you have a TiVO. Invariably there are two or three shows on at once. With my XL4 I can tape up to four shows at once so I can keep up on the series from Castle to NCIS that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Henkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVR
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Tivo Premier DVR XL4 to replace my Time Warner cable box which shuts off from time to time in the middle of the week. Trying to record shows using my PC as the DVR with my Time Warner Box was a crap shot. The Tivo box has so far exceeded my expectation however, it has one major flaw. It cannot be backed up. You have to wait for the 2TB Hard Drive to fail before you get another Hard drive with nothing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: 4 session recording  @ 1 time.  Works well and "even my wife" can use it, while she had trouble with a comcast dvr machine.
customer_reviews.text: It was a very surprising and delightful experience to set this puppy up. Only problem I had was returning my comcast equipment and getting my cable card to work. I'm now up and running, I have wireless network service, netflix, amazon movies and hulu. I purchased a second remote with the slide out keyboard. Great partner for my Sony internet/3-d/ led/ 46 " 1080P hd TV. All is great in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain34

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you're looking for in a DVR. I wanted to upgrade from the cheap cable company DVR that doesn't hold much space and constantly freezes up and this TiVO does the job. I love everything about it. If I had to complain, it would be that the TiVO system can be a little slow responding at times. Like, you're clicking around and there can be slight delays in changing the channel or scrolling through the menu. But that's hardly something to worry about. Overall, it is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - 4 tuners and a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted - 4 tuners and a huge hard drive. I'm thrilled!!! The seller packed the package very well and was very professional in communications.
customer_reviews.author: Tickled Pink

customer_reviews.title: The record cache for watching football games.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tiro menu and ease of use. but the Slow menu updates I HATE. Beach ball working thingy. You could write some better code on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Flo

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had waited for the new Roamio
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit but I bought it just days before the Roamio was introduced. I like the redesigned menu and that it has a picture-in-picture while using many of the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Juch

customer_reviews.title: Better software than other dvrs
customer_reviews.text: I got my first TiVo when they were in partnership with directv before HD was available. When I recently moved to cable I was using the Cable-One supplied dvr found it lacking so I got a XL4 and the features i missed (with the cable supplied dvr) e.g. wish lists, and auto cropping.
customer_reviews.author: nameless

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase my TiVo to move towards my goal of reducing my cable bill and get rid if an awful DVR. The DVR we had with cable didn't work well and kept making recording errors. I'm happy to say that we have encountered zero errors with the TiVo! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Texjann

customer_reviews.title: Sour Grapes-purchased XL4 only 3 weeks ago and now Roamio available
customer_reviews.text: Sour Grapes-purchased XL4 only 3 weeks ago and now Roamio available. Old Series 3 HD failed after 5+ years so bought XL4 HD. Less than 1 month later Tivo launches new Roamio product line with the features I was truly waiting for. Wish I had known this was coming..........aaarrggghhh!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: TiVo XL4 Premiere
customer_reviews.text: This DVR is great. I travel a lot and record plenty of shows, sometimes more than two at the same time. That's where this DVR shines. I love it. The software is a little slow but you can put up with that. If you need plenty of room and more than two tuners, this is your buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Racicot

customer_reviews.title: This box is great. I love the amount of HD storage file ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a TiVo guy. This box is great. I love the amount of HD storage file space it has.
customer_reviews.author: P folts

customer_reviews.title: Frees us from broadcast schedules
customer_reviews.text: Had Comcast, switched to Verizon FiOS, didn't want to pay either one to rent their sub-par DVRs. Friend had TiVo and raved about it, so decided to try it. TiVo has been really great so far. The guide is far superior to Comcast or Verizon, and the DVR works very well. The setup process could have been easier/faster, but that's a relatively small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: we watch it anytime
customer_reviews.text: both of us being over 70, we often wake up in the middle of the night, an d it is nice to be able to watch our recorded shows whenever we desire.
customer_reviews.author: Estel J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing else that begins to do all that the Tivo DVR can do, making TV viewing a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.text: I have five Tivo DVR's with lifetime subscriptions altogether, and I can't imagine ever going back to watching TV without them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Stephens

customer_reviews.title: It's my window to the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TiVo for the recording space and the ability to record 4 shows at once. I got that and MORE! Works perfectly and I LOVE being able to watch either TiVo from either TiVo. Thank you TiVo!
customer_reviews.author: R. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Love that Tivo!
customer_reviews.text: We are now on our third Tivo - wouldn't want to be without it. Watch television on my own schedule and flip through commercials! Super!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead of a Comcast Cable box
customer_reviews.text: Great DVR, excellent netflix/Hulu/Xfinity On Demand integration and with 4 tuners and 2TB of space you will never miss a show.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: love it - easy to use, lots of features
customer_reviews.text: have had a tivo since the very first unit. Have had multiple Tivos over the years and love the service and function. Tivo is the standard in DVR
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: I would give 5 stars but my cable company always ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but my cable company always has issues with TiVo units when they switch channels from analog to digital. Wish everyone could get together to if these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Keith F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned for Roamio. 4 tuners, built in wireless, can run mini's off it!
customer_reviews.author: BoobearTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Watch my shows when I am available
customer_reviews.text: Super easy interface that my four year old daughter can navigate on her own. Plus being able to record up yo four programs at a time is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I should have waited as they now have one with six tuners.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier of God

customer_reviews.title: it works like it should
customer_reviews.text: never miss a show if it is shown later and can not be recorded at regular time it will record later on season pass
customer_reviews.author: lisa risa

customer_reviews.title: Long time Tivo customer
customer_reviews.text: My third Tivo and I can't do without it. For 4-5 years we lived with just the FiOs DVR, but was constantly frustrated with the response time. Finally bit the bullet again, and couldn't be happier to be back in the Tivo fold! The new 4-tuner unit is awesome, and there's so much disk space for the hi-def recordings. Highly recommend the Tivo to anybody!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Wade

customer_reviews.title: I like being able to record all the shows I want to watch  and skip all the ads when watching them
customer_reviews.text: Set up is explained well and easy to follow . I like that I can record up to 4 channels all at once/ It is great to be able to watch live tv and if you missed somethin that was said or done you can go back and look at it
customer_reviews.author: D4Stone

customer_reviews.title: 4 Tuners, Lots of storage space, fast and easy to use menus.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Tivo, and each time I have been impressed by the improvements over the previous model. This new XL4 is fast, has more than enough tuners and plenty of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Greer

customer_reviews.title: My tivo allows me to watch my shows when I want and with the ability to record up to 6 shows at once I never miss anything
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my TiVo Premier XL. It is now the hub for my digital entertainment, with beautiful live television, top notch recording capabilities, Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, and access to XFINITY On Demand content.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Season passes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Once I set a season pass, I never have to worry about when the new season starts as it is always waiting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Great DVR
customer_reviews.text: I have loved TiVo for about 10 years and I love being able to record 4 channels at the same time. The only time I don't like is this model is it doesn't record broadcast channels
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly; no more commercials!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for the family. After looking around, this was the best price I could find, even with the charge for shipping. It arrived within 3 days in great condition. Looking forward to setting it up and skipping commercials!
customer_reviews.author: MommyMegan

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my 3 yr old TiVO elite... this device has great updates and the UI is an added plus from the older TiVO...
customer_reviews.author: N. Temple

customer_reviews.title: flexibility reliability
customer_reviews.text: praise everything about it especially searches and recurring recordings but the pricing schedule for multiple sets is a little steep
customer_reviews.author: LWRIII

customer_reviews.title: love my new xl4
customer_reviews.text: upgraded from series 2 toshiba. love the features of the xl4 and all hd programming. no problems with install except a bad verizon cablecard. the new card came up easily.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Tivo is great.
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from my series 2 TiVo. It is HD, four recording channels and much larger storage. Getting this with lifetime service and not getting the latest Romeo saved several hundred dollars. I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVR
customer_reviews.text: The Tivo Premiere XL4 is a top notch digital video recorder with many features and capabilities that not even cable or satellite companies offer with their digital video recorder.
customer_reviews.author: JP White

customer_reviews.title: Great DVR
customer_reviews.text: Recording 4 shows at once is great. There is enough storage for all our HD shows. With our old TiVo we always had conflicts trying to record more than two shows at the same time. And, we were always running out of space. Not anymore! This Tivo is great. well worth the money to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: amac67

customer_reviews.title: Tivo and Wireless adapter
customer_reviews.text: TiVo works great. I couldn't have hooked it up without tech support. I'm learning to use the features. I love being able to record my programs continuously and watch them when I want.
customer_reviews.author: KRossie

customer_reviews.title: I can record all shows I watch for watching later.  Alot of programs I watch are on at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled now days so I watch a lot of tv. I like to record all my favorite shows to watch during the day when all the day time programing is on. Most daytime programing is terrible and a I have no interest in most of it, There is only so much women's talk shows, court tv and dont get me started about soaps! My Tivo allows me to watch what I want when I want it, The Apps lets me connect to other services such as Net flix too which is a bonus for me
customer_reviews.author: Diane .

customer_reviews.title: This said new but came used as the remote had ...
customer_reviews.text: This said new but came used as the remote had used rechargable batteries in it with foostuck on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cesmat

customer_reviews.title: 4 Tunners
customer_reviews.text: 4 Tunner's works great! Now I don't miss recordings that I use to miss with my original Tivo. Great device
customer_reviews.author: Smooth1SITF

customer_reviews.title: Four tuners
customer_reviews.text: Love the multi-tuners; am a convert from 15 years with DirecTV, and no regrets. Tuning adaptor has some issues, but I don't believe that's Tivo's fault.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love the Premiere XL4 and the Mini
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage space, the 4 tuners, the guide and the fact that I can share a tuner with my TiVo Mini.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought our 3rd generation Tivo. The first gen. is currently not used, the XL and XL4 are. Lately have trouble with Tivo being slow to respond. At times I get a notice on screen that the Tivo network is experiencing difficulties. I have to uplug the machine for a few seconds replug and wait to it to start again, then all is well. Any clue as to why this is happening? Other than this, Tivo is the best out of three we have had: Tivo, Comcast box, Direct TV.
customer_reviews.author: YaYaLu

customer_reviews.title: great but complicated
customer_reviews.text: love it but why is it so complicated to make it work with Time Warner cable? and why don't they have one for Dish? too bad TIVO you are not going to last
customer_reviews.author: Marcel  R. Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Works great; lots of recording time.
customer_reviews.text: Box was easy to set up and worked great as expected. Also purchased the streaming box for networked devices. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John R Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Returned to vendor. It should always be stated in ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned to vendor. It should always be stated in the description if there is an additional charge to work the product. With this product there is monthly fee in order for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TiVo TCD758250 Premiere XL4 Digital Video Recorder (Black)
product_meta.description: TiVo Premiere is much more than a DVR. It's a cable box, a movie box, a web box, and a music box. With Premiere, you'll not only get the world's best DVR, you'll enjoy access to a vast universe of broadband entertainment.
feature_bullets: Four tuners to record four shows at once
Up to 300 HD hours, up to 2,200 hours in SD
Supports digital channels only, MoCA (multimedia over coax) bridge
THX Certified for sound & video, Dolby 5.1

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars705 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
